name: Greenfield Academy
results: All results available at the school office.
about: Established in 1985, Greenfield Academy is a premier educational institution in Lilongwe, committed to providing quality education and nurturing young minds. Our modern facilities and experienced faculty ensure students receive the best education possible.

admissionInfo.requirements: Birth certificate, Previous school reports, Medical certificate, Passport photos (4)
admissionInfo.process: Visit the school office, Complete application form, Pay application fee of MK 5,000, Attend interview
admissionInfo.deadline: Applications close on December 15th each year

news.title: New Science Laboratory Opened
news.content: We are excited to announce the opening of our state-of-the-art science laboratory, equipped with modern equipment for physics, chemistry, and biology experiments.

news.title: Sports Day 2025
news.content: Annual sports day will be held on February 20th, 2025. All students are encouraged to participate in various athletic events.

news.title: Academic Excellence Awards
news.content: Congratulations to our top performers in the 2024 national examinations. 95% of our students achieved distinction grades.

announcements.title: Term 1 2025 Begins
announcements.content: Classes for Term 1 2025 begin on January 22nd. All students should report by 7:00 AM.

announcements.title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
announcements.content: Parent-teacher consultations scheduled for January 25th from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM.

announcements.title: Library Hours Extended
announcements.content: The school library will now be open until 6:00 PM on weekdays to accommodate more study time.
